NewsArticle.Title: Updates and Itemshop
NewsArticle.Content: Updates - Monster Boss AI * Fixed players from being stuck in the quest after killing Lost Ruins Boss "Law" * Increased drop-rate of Lumen Amulet from Muisir Boss - Lower level Monsters * Individually increased EXP from more low-level monsters - Itemshop Release * Experience Gem - Sell your experience from anywhere! * 25% Bonus EXP/AP - Increases EXP/AP received by 25% * 50% Bonus EXP/AP - Increases EXP/AP received by 50% - Future Release * Muisir Extension * New AB Armors/Weapons etc. Please continue sending in your requests and suggestions. Dark Ages Team
